location: Nile City Towers - 2005 B, Corniche El Nil Ramlet Beaulac, Cairo 2466 Egypt
description: A melting pot of history and diversity, the city of Cairo is ideal for both business and leisure. Like the city itself, Fairmont Nile City offers a delightful series of contrasts, combining advanced technology and modern design with local flavors and flair. With sweeping panoramas of the river Nile and the Pyramids in the distance, Cairo’s beauty and history are always in sight from your luxury accommodation. During your stay, embark on culinary adventures at the city’s finest restaurants, enjoy the fresh air at our rooftop poolside restaurant and pamper yourself at Willow Stream Spa. Part of the prestigious Nile City complex, this luxury hotel is the perfect location for business events. The space consists of 845 square meters (9,100 square feet) plus 450 square meters (4,800 square feet) of outdoor space dedicated to meetings and conventions, comprising of 10 meeting rooms including a ballroom. The space also offers spectacular river Nile views.

location: Dr Abd Al Aziz Al Shennawy St, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: You are invited to escape the noise and the pollution and to enjoy the peaceful atmosphere on Al Masa spectacular heights. While sitting under a pergola surrounded by the stunning nature enjoy beverage of choice that are served to match the moment. It is the spot for a quiet, contemplative moment where you can enjoy the tranquility of the environment. In a one-of-a-kind experience, imagine your self-hiking along one of the most beautiful ridge walks in the green foothills. Al Masa Hotel features a terrace with a swimming pool. In the green area of Nasr City, it includes 5 restaurants and a spa center. All the elegant rooms have a balcony. Al Masa Hotel has a selection of activities, including different types of massages, Billiards, cinema and bowling. Cairo International Airport is a 10-minute drive and Cairo International Conference Centre is just a 5-minute drive away. The center of Cairo and the Egyptian Museum are both 20 minutes away by car.

description: Le Passage Cairo Hotel & Casino is located in Heliopolis, an elegant business and residential district in Cairo and it is considered one of the safest area in town. Great design is the key to this urban, cosmopolitan business and leisure base, providing a sophisticated and stylish environment in the throbbing heart of Egypt and the Middle East. Le Passage Cairo Hotel & Casino celebrates individuality with a wide range of accommodation choices from well appointed rooms and suites with exquisite views to the Executive Club floor which is ideal for business travelers, short breaks, family holidays or those special occasions.

location: 3 El Thawra Council St Zamalek, Cairo Egypt
description: On the southern tip of Gezirah Island, the hotel is a corner of paradise in central Cairo, minutes from Cairo’s business districts. Discover a haven of peace during a vacation in Egypt, and a comfortable base to rest after a successful day of business. Relax by the pool, pamper yourself in Sofitel SPA, wine and dine in our international restaurants and bars. Surrender to luxury and come for a day, a weekend, a week…or more. A stroll along the hotel’s lush riverside promenade takes you to a host of acclaimed restaurants and bars. You can take your time, enjoying the cool shade of exotic palms and breathing in the scent of hibiscus. You’ll hear the gentle sound of water lapping as you rest on a Nile-side terrace with a cool drink, and dine on international cuisine. It’s especially beautiful at dusk, when the sun sets over Cairo’s skyline and vibrant nightlife. Escape the city for a day at our secluded Cairo hotel, which feels like an exclusive Egyptian resort set in lush gardens. Take advantage of Sofitel SPA and Sofitel FIT, float in an infinity pool overlooking the Nile, unwind in a bubbling whirlpool bath… whatever you desire. Day membership includes discounts to the restaurants and bars which line the Nile-side promenade, promising refreshment and fun for families, couples and friends.

description: An oasis of greenery in the heart of New Cairo, Dusit Thani Lake View Cairo brings a taste of gracious Thai hospitality to the center of Egypt. Conveniently situated near Cairo International airport, the hotel enjoys pride of place in New Cairo’s Fifth Settlement in close proximity to the main roads that lead to major attractions, including the Pyramids, Sphinx, Citadel and Egyptian Museum. Guests are welcomed with elegant rooms and suites, three outdoor swimming pools, a fitness center, world-class spa and an array of fine dining options spanning a world of tastes and flavours.

location: First Settlement, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: Let us welcome you to Royal Maxim Palace Kempinski, a haven of tranquillity in the heart of New Cairo. Offering a range of palatial services, the 5 star hotel features the finest facilities coupled with the highest levels of service. The hotel’s optimum location on the city’s ring road and its close proximity to Cairo International Airport make it the perfect starting point from which to explore Cairo’s treasures. With a distinctive architecture standing proudly against the New Cairo skyline, each of the 245 rooms and suites present comfortable and elegant fittings and furnishings. Enhance your stay with a visit to one of our eight exceptional restaurants & bars, or treat yourself to a rejuvenating treatment at our world-class Resense Spa. The unique architecture of New Cairo’s palatial landmark extends to our dedicated banquet floor, which includes 11 customisable meeting rooms and the largest ballroom in Egypt, Excelsior Ballroom.

description: On the southern tip of Gezirah Island, the hotel is a corner of paradise in central Cairo, minutes from Cairo’s business districts. Discover a haven of peace during a vacation in Egypt, and a comfortable base to rest after a successful day of business. Relax by the pool, pamper yourself in Sofitel SPA, wine and dine in our international restaurants and bars. Surrender to luxury and come for a day, a weekend, a week…or more. A stroll along the hotel’s lush riverside promenade takes you to a host of acclaimed restaurants and bars. You can take your time, enjoying the cool shade of exotic palms and breathing in the scent of hibiscus. You’ll hear the gentle sound of water lapping as you rest on a Nile-side terrace with a cool drink, and dine on international cuisine. It’s especially beautiful at dusk, when the sun sets over Cairo’s skyline and vibrant nightlife. Escape the city for a day at our secluded Cairo hotel, which feels like an exclusive Egyptian resort set in lush gardens. Take advantage of Sofitel SPA and Sofitel FIT, float in an infinity pool overlooking the Nile, unwind in a bubbling whirlpool bath… whatever you desire. Day membership includes discounts to the restaurants and bars which line the Nile-side promenade, promising refreshment and fun for families, couples and friends.

location: Nile City Towers - 2005 B, Corniche El Nil Ramlet Beaulac, Cairo 2466 Egypt
description: A melting pot of history and diversity, the city of Cairo is ideal for both business and leisure. Like the city itself, Fairmont Nile City offers a delightful series of contrasts, combining advanced technology and modern design with local flavors and flair. With sweeping panoramas of the river Nile and the Pyramids in the distance, Cairo’s beauty and history are always in sight from your luxury accommodation. During your stay, embark on culinary adventures at the city’s finest restaurants, enjoy the fresh air at our rooftop poolside restaurant and pamper yourself at Willow Stream Spa. Part of the prestigious Nile City complex, this luxury hotel is the perfect location for business events. The space consists of 845 square meters (9,100 square feet) plus 450 square meters (4,800 square feet) of outdoor space dedicated to meetings and conventions, comprising of 10 meeting rooms including a ballroom. The space also offers spectacular river Nile views.

description: Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Cairo does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hilton Cairo Heliopolis, a nice option for travelers like you. While staying at Hilton Cairo Heliopolis, visitors can check out Baron Palace (2.1 mi) and St. Mark's Coptic Orthodox Church (2.3 mi), some of Cairo's top attractions. You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as Hilton Cairo Heliopolis offers guests free Wi-Fi. The hotel features room service and a concierge. Plus, Hilton Cairo Heliopolis offers a pool, and providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. During your stay enjoy variety of international cuisines such as Raj Indian Restaurant, Leonardo Italian restaurant, Lan-Tania Thai Restaurant, Nobel house Asian restaurant and Al-Dabke Lebanese restaurant. While in Cairo be sure to experience nearby popular attractions like Egyptian Air Force Museum (0.9 mi) and Obelisk of Ramses II (1.2 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel. Hilton Cairo Heliopolis looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Cairo. NOTE: The following services and amenities are available, but with reduced service: Business Center, Fitness Center, On-site Restaurant(s).

description: Modern serviced apartments for extended stays in dynamic Cairo Citystars. Offering the comfort and convenience of a home away from home, Staybridge Suites® Cairo Citystars has everything you need for independent living in the exciting commercial hub of Heliopolis. With direct access to Stars Centre shopping mall, and just a seven-minute drive from Cairo International Airport and Cairo International Convention and Exhibition Centre, our 140 fully furnished studios and suites place travelers where they need to be. The buzzing streets of downtown Cairo are half an hour away, with the Great Pyramids a little further. Business travelers on extended stays in Cairo can settle into a spacious studio or suite with up to three bedrooms. Full kitchens and living areas let you cook, work and entertain in style, and Wi-Fi is complimentary throughout. A free buffet breakfast sets you up for the day, and an Evening Social invites you to mingle with fellow guests over dinner three nights a week.

name: Dahab Hostel
aminities: ,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Wifi,Board games / puzzles,Airport transportation,Rooftop terrace,24-hour security,24-hour front desk,Laundry service,Taxi service,Baggage storage,Shared bathroom,Shared kitchen,Shared lounge / TV area,Sun terrace,Non-smoking rooms
location: 26 Mahmoud Bassiouny Rooftop, 7th Floor, Talat Harb Sq, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: Dahab Hostel, Your Oasis in the City... It has been open since 1998. It has been registered in all the major guidebooks and has consistently received positive reviews. Dabab Hostel is centrally located in the heart of Downtown Cairo. It is just a 3-minute-walking distance to the Egyptian Museum in Tahrir Sq., and within easy reach to the main train and bus stations. Dabab Hostel has its own special charm. It is a collection of whitewashed huts on the rooftop attempting to recreate the feel of Sinai beach camp in an unremittingly urban Downtown Cairo. Once you get inside, you will definitely sense the totally laid-back, chilled out and cozy atmosphere. The outdoor garden area is just superb for lounging around and catching up with other travelers in the evening. The breeze is refreshing and the vibe is incontestable. It is an ideal place for artistic travellers as well. Enjoy the fantastic reggae music played, laying back in the sun, smoking Shisha 'Water pipe' on the rooftop at the Bedwin corner. Sit back & relax, plan your itineraries & catch up with your family & friends by logging onto our new optimized FREE WiFi Broadband Internet coverage for the entire hostel. Our rooms are equipped withprivate facilities and A/C. We have single, double and private dorms available and there are 39 rooms in total. Airport Pickup Service Once you have made your booking, you will be contacted by a staff member to organize it with you. At the airport, you will find our representative waiting for you holding a sign of your name and Dahab hostel, after you finish passport checking and custom clearance. Things to see in the local area Shopping Bazars. Khan El-Khalili Market. Al Azhar Mosque. Old Cairo /Islamic Cairo. Coptic Area. The Citadel. Cairo Tower. Cairo Opera House. In the evenings, the local area has a wide variety of restaurants and lively nightspots. Thank you for choosing Dahab Hostel ... See you soon in Cairo... ...::: NEW :::... Check out our new Deluxe rooms with private facilities and A/C

Here, quintessential luxury meets stately elegance. On the fast track to becoming Egypt’s epicenter of governance and commerce, the new administrative capital will play host to heads of state and their delegations, while acting as the seat of power for the country’s government. Featuring a vibrant new center of arts and culture, the capital will also attract artists and art lovers to enchanting and inspiring destinations like the stunning Grand Opera House. Also, not far off are one of the world’s most iconic ancient wonders - the pyramids.

description: A melting pot of history and diversity, the city of Cairo is ideal for both business and leisure. Like the city itself, Fairmont Nile City offers a delightful series of contrasts, combining advanced technology and modern design with local flavors and flair. With sweeping panoramas of the river Nile and the Pyramids in the distance, Cairo’s beauty and history are always in sight from your luxury accommodation. During your stay, embark on culinary adventures at the city’s finest restaurants, enjoy the fresh air at our rooftop poolside restaurant and pamper yourself at Willow Stream Spa. Part of the prestigious Nile City complex, this luxury hotel is the perfect location for business events. The space consists of 845 square meters (9,100 square feet) plus 450 square meters (4,800 square feet) of outdoor space dedicated to meetings and conventions, comprising of 10 meeting rooms including a ballroom. The space also offers spectacular river Nile views.

location: 21 Mohamed Mazhar St. Zamalek, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: Set on the picturesque and exclusive island of Zamalek on the magnificent waters of the River Nile, the Hilton Zamalek Residence Cairo is located in a tranquil spot between downtown Cairo and Giza and is only 12 miles from Cairo Airport. All of the luxurious guest rooms at this hotel in Cairo offer spectacular city or river views and feature modern amenities such as high-speed internet access and LCD TVs. Upgrade to an elegant suite for additional space, a kitchen, living and dining areas and terraces offering scenic Nile views. Hold a professional conference in one of 3 flexible meeting rooms, all of which feature the latest in audio/visual technology and make use of our business center. Dine on international and oriental cuisine overlooking the pool and the River Nile in Nile Breeze, listen to live music in the Tea Time Lounge and enjoy casual al fresco food and drink on the deck at Waves. Work out in the complimentary Fitness Center, swim lengths in the heated swimming pool, which features a Jacuzzi or indulge in a massage while the little ones have fun in the Children’s Play Area. Explore the Egyptian Museum, experience the exotic sights, sounds and smells of the vibrant Egyptian Bazaar, 'Khan El-Khalili' and marvel at the Great Sphinx and Pyramids at Giza.

Next to the hotel, Stars Centre Mall is home to over 640 of shops and high-tech amusements including Snow City and Magic Galaxy, Egypt's largest indoor theme park. Downtown Cairo is less than half an hour away. The hotel's family-friendly atmosphere makes everyone feel at home, from the rooftop garden with its adults' and children's swimming pools, to the Star Corner Café in the lobby. Open 24-hours, Windows Restaurant tempts diners with heaped international buffets and live cooking stations, and Indira Restaurant serves some of the best Indian food in Cairo. Business travelers appreciate the fast, free Wi-Fi, business center and 24-hour room service. Need to hold a meeting?

description: A Heavenly Retreat of Well-Being in Cairo A sanctuary of well-being amidst bustling Cairo, The Westin Cairo Golf Resort & Spa Katameya Dunes is tucked away in this fast-emerging, upscale, integrated lifestyle enclave in New Cairo, where people escape to discover a relaxing haven, offering 177 rooms & suites inside “Katameya Dunes Compound”, the city’s high-end residential compound. At The Westin Cairo Golf Resort & Spa - Katameya Dunes, every aspect of your stay is carefully designed, from our innovative programs to our revitalizing amenities, everything we do is for a better you. Surrounded by the 27 holes, Sir Nick Faldo designed, Golf Course that is configured into two Championship Golf Courses, The lake, and The Palms. The hotel relaxing facilities set the stage for an energizing stay, inviting every guest to relax and reset. The resort provides an innovative approach to well-being where guests feel they can achieve perfect balance and surrender to the healing touch of enriching experiences so that they can reach their fullest potential. The resort invites guests to a vibrant culinary journey delivered within three dining concepts; from delicious healthy to the finest international ingredients for an unforgettable sensory food experience in the city of Cairo At The Westin Cairo Golf Resort & Spa - Katameya Dunes, our mission is to enable guests to live energizing experiences for the mind, body, and spirit. Our touchpoints and initiatives are designed from our desire to allow for a better you in Cairo. From the contemporary and spacious rooms and suites featuring the iconic Westin Heavenly Bed to the latest WestinWORKOUT fitness studio, a visit to the signature Heavenly Spa, no detail is overlooked. From the moment guests arrive, they feel Westin’s essence, but combined with multicultural flavors elevated by the engaged approach of the warm Egyptian hosts who help them enjoy their stay. All associates are inspired to instinctively and thoughtfully respond to guests’ needs on a personal level. Ultimately, the revitalized travelers and loved ones leave The Westin Cairo Golf Resort & Spa - Katameya Dunes relaxed, enriched, renewed & feeling better.

location: 3 El Thawra Council St Zamalek, Cairo Egypt
description: On the southern tip of Gezirah Island, the hotel is a corner of paradise in central Cairo, minutes from Cairo’s business districts. Discover a haven of peace during a vacation in Egypt, and a comfortable base to rest after a successful day of business. Relax by the pool, pamper yourself in Sofitel SPA, wine and dine in our international restaurants and bars. Surrender to luxury and come for a day, a weekend, a week…or more. A stroll along the hotel’s lush riverside promenade takes you to a host of acclaimed restaurants and bars. You can take your time, enjoying the cool shade of exotic palms and breathing in the scent of hibiscus. You’ll hear the gentle sound of water lapping as you rest on a Nile-side terrace with a cool drink, and dine on international cuisine. It’s especially beautiful at dusk, when the sun sets over Cairo’s skyline and vibrant nightlife. Escape the city for a day at our secluded Cairo hotel, which feels like an exclusive Egyptian resort set in lush gardens. Take advantage of Sofitel SPA and Sofitel FIT, float in an infinity pool overlooking the Nile, unwind in a bubbling whirlpool bath… whatever you desire. Day membership includes discounts to the restaurants and bars which line the Nile-side promenade, promising refreshment and fun for families, couples and friends.

description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travellers visiting Cairo, Tolip El Galaa Hotel Cairo is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Tolip El Galaa Hotel Cairo makes it easy to enjoy the best of Cairo.Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Tolip El Galaa Hotel Cairo makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as St. Mark's Coptic Orthodox Church (1.3 mi) and Saqqara (Sakkara) Pyramids (1.3 mi), guests of Tolip El Galaa Hotel Cairo can easily experience some of Cairo's most well known attractions.If you like barbeque restaurants, Tolip El Galaa Hotel Cairo is conveniently located near Abou Shakra, Studio Masr, and Qasr Abou Atallah For BBQ.Best of all, Tolip El Galaa Hotel Cairo makes it easy to experience many great Cairo attractions like Manial Palace Museum, Museum of Islamic Arts, and Abdeen Palace Museum, which are some popular history museums.Whether you’re travelling for business, pleasure or both, Tolip El Galaa Hotel Cairo is sure to make your visit to Cairo one worth remembering.

description: Situated in one of Cairo's affluent districts- Heliopolis, The Gabriel's design is inspired by classical era and is decorated with warm colours. It offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and a retail arcade.The rooms and suites at The Gabriel feature luxurious furnishings and are fitted with Egyptian cotton bedding. Each has a seating area with a flat-screen TV, Bose sound system and a wardrobe. The bathroom is fitted with designer amenities.Salt Restaurant and Bar is a gourmet restaurant that serves Mediterranean cuisine prepared with finest fresh local and Mediterranean ingredients combined with spices and herbs. Room service is available 24 hours.The Gabriel is attached to SunCity Mall, home of many international and local retail brands,variety of food and beverage outlets, a bowling center, multi language Cinemas and many more activities for the entire family. The famous Baron Palace is only 3 km away while Cairo International Airport is 5 km drive away. Private parking is possible on site.

name: New Star Zamalek Hotel
location: 34 B Yehia Ibrahim St. Zamalek, Cairo Egypt
description: The location was great, but there isn't much else to recommend. The rooms weren't dirty and breakfast was great, but despite requesting a single larger bed upon making the reservation, we were given two twin size beds. One of the beds was broken to the point of being basically unusable. At one point, they cleaned our room and they put wet sheets on our bed. It took a lot of work to get dry sheets from the front desk, as they seemed completely uninterested in helping us, and then we had to remake our now wet bed. Not only that, I think someone smoked in our room while cleaning it. The lobby constantly smelled strongly of cheap perfume covering up cigarette smoke. And you won't be able to sleep in as there is a school that meets outside and children chanting and a drum beating to march them to school. The value is good for location and breakfast, but I wouldn't stay here again.…

location: Nile City Towers - 2005 B, Corniche El Nil Ramlet Beaulac, Cairo 2466 Egypt
description: A melting pot of history and diversity, the city of Cairo is ideal for both business and leisure. Like the city itself, Fairmont Nile City offers a delightful series of contrasts, combining advanced technology and modern design with local flavors and flair. With sweeping panoramas of the river Nile and the Pyramids in the distance, Cairo’s beauty and history are always in sight from your luxury accommodation. During your stay, embark on culinary adventures at the city’s finest restaurants, enjoy the fresh air at our rooftop poolside restaurant and pamper yourself at Willow Stream Spa. Part of the prestigious Nile City complex, this luxury hotel is the perfect location for business events. The space consists of 845 square meters (9,100 square feet) plus 450 square meters (4,800 square feet) of outdoor space dedicated to meetings and conventions, comprising of 10 meeting rooms including a ballroom. The space also offers spectacular river Nile views.

description: About Freedom Hostel *Enjoy accommodation in style. Your travelling experience comes complete with a contemporary in-house lounge, laundry facilities and small guest kitchen. You can book travel & tours at our travel desk and keep in touch with friends & family with our internet corner, Wi-Fi and international telephone access. With our free luggage storage facilities, 24 hour reception and host of friendly staff will make your stay in Cairo a breeze. * If you've never been to Cairo before it can be quite an overwhelming and intimidating place, so why not let us make it easy for you? Less stress = more fun! No one understands the importance of having a great time while on Holiday like our staff here at Freedom Hostel. We provide the best tours and entertainment packages you'll find in this city. Forget a big, boring hotel or hostel with nothing going on - come stay with us and get a taste of Egypt that few visitors get to experience! Location Information *Our Location is one of the most easy to be reached at just 200 meters from the famous Talaat Harb Square, in front off the central bank of Egypt. *The Egyptian Museum is about 5/10 Minutes' walk. *Several Egyptian and International restaurants, cinemas and shopping malls are located nearby. Tea, coffee and shisha cafes located just few meters away. Accommodation Information *Our accommodation options include deluxe twin or double en-suited rooms, single or triple private rooms and dormitory rooms. All come with fresh white linen, a balcony, air-conditioning and a modern security system.

description: RUDE Security Officers.. this hotel has the worst security officials and officers . They Harass you so much when you enter the hotel . They check you and your bags . They make you walk through a metal detector . And then tell that you cannot go in, as this is for hotel people and hen you try to explain that you are staying at the hotel they won’t listen. After arguing and showing door card and wrist band .. they huff and puff .. say some Arabic words.   Then you get to hotel lob and again you get harassed and again walk through metal detectors.  Put your bags through X-ray machine .  This happens everyday and all the time . We have complainers at hotel reception and they apologised and said this will now happen again but it does and it makes you feel so uncomfortable.   The hotel is heavily surrounded by army officers too.   Not a place to take your family   You cannot bring any food or drinks from outiside as it is hotel policy .   This place is horrible and i will it be coming back .  AVOID please…

description: Modern serviced apartments for extended stays in dynamic Cairo Citystars. Offering the comfort and convenience of a home away from home, Staybridge Suites® Cairo Citystars has everything you need for independent living in the exciting commercial hub of Heliopolis. With direct access to Stars Centre shopping mall, and just a seven-minute drive from Cairo International Airport and Cairo International Convention and Exhibition Centre, our 140 fully furnished studios and suites place travelers where they need to be. The buzzing streets of downtown Cairo are half an hour away, with the Great Pyramids a little further. Business travelers on extended stays in Cairo can settle into a spacious studio or suite with up to three bedrooms. Full kitchens and living areas let you cook, work and entertain in style, and Wi-Fi is complimentary throughout. A free buffet breakfast sets you up for the day, and an Evening Social invites you to mingle with fellow guests over dinner three nights a week.

description: At Prime Residences, we want to anticipate everything you need and require to make your stay an absolute pleasure. Our residences are built for movers and shakers, established in the prime business districts. We want you to be in the heart of the action, close to the pulse of what matters most supported by our discreet, personal services and elegant lifestyle offerings around the Nation. Our properties are designed to make our guests’ stay extra convenient, providing concierge and security services in addition to housekeeping and laundry. Offering apartment types ranging from studios to spectacular 2 bedroom apartments. We offer superb locations, facilities and services; guests choose to stay at Prime for leisure, corporate, and business stays. Prime promise to guests is that they are guaranteed to feel at home. Our stylish modern serviced Studios (50 sqm) in New Cairo City are perfect for leisure or business guests looking for excellent value apartments. Only few minutes away from a number of luxurious shopping malls, our guests are in excellent location to enjoy myriad of restaurants, cafés and cinemas. Studios are fully furnished including an open space with a queen bed and soft linens, modern fully equipped kitchenette featuring fridge, stovetop and microwave, and bathroom includes towels and amenities. Prime Residence offers Studios, 1 bedroom and 2 bedrooms apartments for short and long stays. We offer 24/7 front office and concierge services; to take care of any needs you may have during your stay. Housekeeping, laundry and maintenance services are also available ensuring your home is kept in perfect condition so that you are able to enjoy your stay. Wanting to keep in touch? location: 3 El Thawra Council St Zamalek, Cairo Egypt
description: On the southern tip of Gezirah Island, the hotel is a corner of paradise in central Cairo, minutes from Cairo’s business districts. Discover a haven of peace during a vacation in Egypt, and a comfortable base to rest after a successful day of business. Relax by the pool, pamper yourself in Sofitel SPA, wine and dine in our international restaurants and bars. Surrender to luxury and come for a day, a weekend, a week…or more. A stroll along the hotel’s lush riverside promenade takes you to a host of acclaimed restaurants and bars. You can take your time, enjoying the cool shade of exotic palms and breathing in the scent of hibiscus. You’ll hear the gentle sound of water lapping as you rest on a Nile-side terrace with a cool drink, and dine on international cuisine. It’s especially beautiful at dusk, when the sun sets over Cairo’s skyline and vibrant nightlife. Escape the city for a day at our secluded Cairo hotel, which feels like an exclusive Egyptian resort set in lush gardens. Take advantage of Sofitel SPA and Sofitel FIT, float in an infinity pool overlooking the Nile, unwind in a bubbling whirlpool bath… whatever you desire. Day membership includes discounts to the restaurants and bars which line the Nile-side promenade, promising refreshment and fun for families, couples and friends.

name: Ismailia House Hotel
aminities: ,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Laundry service
location: 1 El Tahrir Sq. Downtown, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: I love this little hotel. I often stayed there as a single woman in Cairo, and they always took good care of me! I have spent hundreds of days there over the last 30 years. I spent a lot of 2020 here, as my apartment was being renovated. The staff made me feel it was my second home.  The hotel is thoroughly cleaned every day. It was redecorated in the last couple years. The building is 1920s style, with high ceilings, balconies with great views of the city, ceiling fans, and lots of charm. The old, original elevator works well--it might take some getting used to, but it is regularly maintained, so you can count on it. If it ever does not work once, the owner gets it checked right away, because he won't be able to stay in business without it. If you find the stairways dirty or the airshaft dirty--these things are typical in Egypt and not something the hotel can do anything about, since they own the eighth floor, but not the building.  The owner, Ashraf, is very kind and accommodating to your needs, as well as an excellent source of information about any where you need to go, how to renew your visa, how to open a bank account, and whatever else you need. The staff are respectful and very honest.   Breakfast is bread, cheese and jam, plus an egg! Most budget places in Egypt don't include an egg. Cold drinks, water, tea and coffee are available at cheap prices. If you want to order a full Egyptian breakfast, it is excellent and not very expensive. Plus with the app "Talabat," you can order from hundreds of area restaurants, if you don't feel like going out. Reception staff can help you order.  There are two suites with AC and a bathroom inside. The other rooms can some with a bathroo or you share the bathrooms, but many are available and cleaned multiple times a day. The bathtubs are clean, but old. It's time to redo the porcelain on them. But they work well and are clean.  You can hang out in the reception area to meet other travelers. They are mostly students, budget travelers an occasional businessman from Saudi. If you want any tour, Ashraf can arrange it, as well as transportation wherever you want, including the airport. He is very honest, which is sometimes not easy to find in Egypt.  The location is the best! Busses and a Metro stop are right in front of you, while taxis are plentiful and not expensive. There are new Uber busses or Svwl busses or cars you can book on apps for fair prices.  The balcony views of Tahrir Square, the Egyptian Museum or the old American University of Cairo campus are fantastic.  Bring earplugs, because Cairo never sleeps, so everywhere is noisy all night.…

description: Modern serviced apartments for extended stays in dynamic Cairo Citystars. Offering the comfort and convenience of a home away from home, Staybridge Suites® Cairo Citystars has everything you need for independent living in the exciting commercial hub of Heliopolis. With direct access to Stars Centre shopping mall, and just a seven-minute drive from Cairo International Airport and Cairo International Convention and Exhibition Centre, our 140 fully furnished studios and suites place travelers where they need to be. The buzzing streets of downtown Cairo are half an hour away, with the Great Pyramids a little further. Business travelers on extended stays in Cairo can settle into a spacious studio or suite with up to three bedrooms. Full kitchens and living areas let you cook, work and entertain in style, and Wi-Fi is complimentary throughout. A free buffet breakfast sets you up for the day, and an Evening Social invites you to mingle with fellow guests over dinner three nights a week.

location: 19 Meret Basha Street, 2nd floor Tahrir Square, Cairo 99999 Egypt
description: Tahrir Plaza Suites is a boutique hotel inspired by ancient Egyptian history. The core theme of the guestrooms’ design is based on four legendary Egyptian gods (Amun-ra, Horus, Osiris & Anubis) and two goddesses (Hathor & Isis), who were worshipped with devotion during the era of the pharaohs and who also became the center point of numerous beliefs and rituals of the ancient Egyptian religion. Unlike conventional hotels, Tahrir Plaza aims to provide guests with a unique and personalized experience. It is for this reason that the hotel has only six suites, which are entirely different from each other and were carefully decorated always caring for the most minimum details such as wall colors, bed design, bathroom tiles and more.

location: 19 Misr. Helwan Road Maadi Entrance, Cairo Egypt
description: Maadi Hotel is a contemporary hotel housed in one of the tallest towers in Maadi business district located about 19 miles from Cairo International Airport. Hotel offers 143 well-appointed selections of rooms and suites for business and leisure stay equally. Hotel is located in heart of the city just off Cornish El Nile – Maadi , in the hub of the business and shopping districts of Maadi. Hotel is within easy access to the Great Pyramids Of Giza & the Egyptian Museum of Cairo. Hotel features a designer outdoor pool with high-tech lounge chairs, and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. MAADI HOTEL’s guests can train at the well-equipped fitness center, or enjoy a sauna or a Steam. After a dip in the heated pool, the hot-tub is the perfect spot to relax. MAADI HOTEL offers contemporary meeting & banquet rooms which can host from 10 – 300 guests all under one roof. La Pablion restaurant offers an elegant atmosphere and international cuisine with theme nights hosted on selected days. Providing light meals and a range of pastries, the lounge cafe is open throughout the day and located at lobby level. A 24-hour room service, on site a gift shop add to the amenities offered to valued guests Cairo is also known for some great art museums, including Gayer-Anderson Museum (Bayt al-Kiritliya), The Coptic Museum, and Museum of Islamic Arts, which are not too far from Maadi Hotel. Maadi Hotel puts the best of Cairo at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

location: Nile City Towers - 2005 B, Corniche El Nil Ramlet Beaulac, Cairo 2466 Egypt
description: A melting pot of history and diversity, the city of Cairo is ideal for both business and leisure. Like the city itself, Fairmont Nile City offers a delightful series of contrasts, combining advanced technology and modern design with local flavors and flair. With sweeping panoramas of the river Nile and the Pyramids in the distance, Cairo’s beauty and history are always in sight from your luxury accommodation. During your stay, embark on culinary adventures at the city’s finest restaurants, enjoy the fresh air at our rooftop poolside restaurant and pamper yourself at Willow Stream Spa. Part of the prestigious Nile City complex, this luxury hotel is the perfect location for business events. The space consists of 845 square meters (9,100 square feet) plus 450 square meters (4,800 square feet) of outdoor space dedicated to meetings and conventions, comprising of 10 meeting rooms including a ballroom. The space also offers spectacular river Nile views.

location: 3 El Thawra Council St Zamalek, Cairo Egypt
description: On the southern tip of Gezirah Island, the hotel is a corner of paradise in central Cairo, minutes from Cairo’s business districts. Discover a haven of peace during a vacation in Egypt, and a comfortable base to rest after a successful day of business. Relax by the pool, pamper yourself in Sofitel SPA, wine and dine in our international restaurants and bars. Surrender to luxury and come for a day, a weekend, a week…or more. A stroll along the hotel’s lush riverside promenade takes you to a host of acclaimed restaurants and bars. You can take your time, enjoying the cool shade of exotic palms and breathing in the scent of hibiscus. You’ll hear the gentle sound of water lapping as you rest on a Nile-side terrace with a cool drink, and dine on international cuisine. It’s especially beautiful at dusk, when the sun sets over Cairo’s skyline and vibrant nightlife. Escape the city for a day at our secluded Cairo hotel, which feels like an exclusive Egyptian resort set in lush gardens. Take advantage of Sofitel SPA and Sofitel FIT, float in an infinity pool overlooking the Nile, unwind in a bubbling whirlpool bath… whatever you desire. Day membership includes discounts to the restaurants and bars which line the Nile-side promenade, promising refreshment and fun for families, couples and friends.

description: See why so many travellers make Grand Hotel their hotel of choice when visiting Cairo. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travellers like you.As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a desk, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to 24 hour front desk, room service, and a gift shop while staying at Grand Hotel. In addition, Grand Hotel offers an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Cairo trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is paid public parking available nearby.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Mosque of Al-Azhar (0.6 mi) and Zamalek (Gezira Island) (1.0 mi), guests of Grand Hotel can easily experience some of Cairo's most well known attractions.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Nile Cairo Dinner Cruise, Kadoura Fish Restaurant, and Aqua e Luce, which are some seafood restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.Best of all, Grand Hotel makes it easy to experience some great Cairo attractions like Military Museum, which is a popular military museum.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Grand Hotel as you experience all of the things Cairo has to offer.

location: Emtedad Makram Obied Street Heliopolis, Cairo 11737 Egypt
description: Modern serviced apartments for extended stays in dynamic Cairo Citystars. Offering the comfort and convenience of a home away from home, Staybridge Suites® Cairo Citystars has everything you need for independent living in the exciting commercial hub of Heliopolis. With direct access to Stars Centre shopping mall, and just a seven-minute drive from Cairo International Airport and Cairo International Convention and Exhibition Centre, our 140 fully furnished studios and suites place travelers where they need to be. The buzzing streets of downtown Cairo are half an hour away, with the Great Pyramids a little further. Business travelers on extended stays in Cairo can settle into a spacious studio or suite with up to three bedrooms. Full kitchens and living areas let you cook, work and entertain in style, and Wi-Fi is complimentary throughout. A free buffet breakfast sets you up for the day, and an Evening Social invites you to mingle with fellow guests over dinner three nights a week.

location: 43 Sherif Basha, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: An old sheikh once said "Service without love is like a beautiful corpse. The outer form is lovely, but it is lifeless" We believe that service is a form of worship and also a powerful method of self-transformation.. By service the Sufis mean service for Gods sake" without any thoughts of rewards but out of love and graduate.. This is the kind of service we offer and provide and that is the way we follow at Sufi house hostel. A little bit about Sufi House Hostel: Our 24-hour welcome and information desk is always there to help with any questions. In addition, guests can get information on what to visit in the city and how to get there safely and securely. Or if this is your first time visiting Cairo, our daily guided tours and activities provide a friendly and accessible introduction to everything Cairo has to offer, from local concerts in Cairo to the great pyramids of Egypt. For your comfort, coffee/tea in a common area, laundry facilities are available at this property.

description: A modern, family-friendly hotel in Cairo's dynamic Citystars Heliopolis In the heart of Citystars business and leisure complex and just 10 minutes from Cairo International Airport, the Holiday Inn® Cairo Citystars hotel is an ideal base for exploring the modern and historic attractions of Egypt's capital. Next to the hotel, Stars Centre Mall is home to over 640 of shops and high-tech amusements including Snow City and Magic Galaxy, Egypt's largest indoor theme park. Downtown Cairo is less than half an hour away. The hotel's family-friendly atmosphere makes everyone feel at home, from the rooftop garden with its adults' and children's swimming pools, to the Star Corner Café in the lobby. Open 24-hours, Windows Restaurant tempts diners with heaped international buffets and live cooking stations, and Indira Restaurant serves some of the best Indian food in Cairo. Business travelers appreciate the fast, free Wi-Fi, business center and 24-hour room service. Need to hold a meeting?

location: 21 Mohamed Mazhar St. Zamalek, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: Set on the picturesque and exclusive island of Zamalek on the magnificent waters of the River Nile, the Hilton Zamalek Residence Cairo is located in a tranquil spot between downtown Cairo and Giza and is only 12 miles from Cairo Airport. All of the luxurious guest rooms at this hotel in Cairo offer spectacular city or river views and feature modern amenities such as high-speed internet access and LCD TVs. Upgrade to an elegant suite for additional space, a kitchen, living and dining areas and terraces offering scenic Nile views. Hold a professional conference in one of 3 flexible meeting rooms, all of which feature the latest in audio/visual technology and make use of our business center. Dine on international and oriental cuisine overlooking the pool and the River Nile in Nile Breeze, listen to live music in the Tea Time Lounge and enjoy casual al fresco food and drink on the deck at Waves. Work out in the complimentary Fitness Center, swim lengths in the heated swimming pool, which features a Jacuzzi or indulge in a massage while the little ones have fun in the Children’s Play Area. Explore the Egyptian Museum, experience the exotic sights, sounds and smells of the vibrant Egyptian Bazaar, 'Khan El-Khalili' and marvel at the Great Sphinx and Pyramids at Giza.

description: A melting pot of history and diversity, the city of Cairo is ideal for both business and leisure. Like the city itself, Fairmont Nile City offers a delightful series of contrasts, combining advanced technology and modern design with local flavors and flair. With sweeping panoramas of the river Nile and the Pyramids in the distance, Cairo’s beauty and history are always in sight from your luxury accommodation. During your stay, embark on culinary adventures at the city’s finest restaurants, enjoy the fresh air at our rooftop poolside restaurant and pamper yourself at Willow Stream Spa. Part of the prestigious Nile City complex, this luxury hotel is the perfect location for business events. The space consists of 845 square meters (9,100 square feet) plus 450 square meters (4,800 square feet) of outdoor space dedicated to meetings and conventions, comprising of 10 meeting rooms including a ballroom. The space also offers spectacular river Nile views.

name: Sufi House

description: An old sheikh once said "Service without love is like a beautiful corpse. The outer form is lovely, but it is lifeless" We believe that service is a form of worship and also a powerful method of self-transformation.. By service the Sufis mean service for Gods sake" without any thoughts of rewards but out of love and graduate.. This is the kind of service we offer and provide and that is the way we follow at Sufi house hostel. A little bit about Sufi House Hostel: Our 24-hour welcome and information desk is always there to help with any questions. In addition, guests can get information on what to visit in the city and how to get there safely and securely. Or if this is your first time visiting Cairo, our daily guided tours and activities provide a friendly and accessible introduction to everything Cairo has to offer, from local concerts in Cairo to the great pyramids of Egypt. For your comfort, coffee/tea in a common area, laundry facilities are available at this property.

name: Almadiafa
location: 4 Champollion Road Above Ahli United Bank, The Ninth Floor, Cairo 11556 Egypt
description: Very glad I read the reviews before going, because the entrance of the hotel was very sketchy and didn't look like a hotel.   There were no signs as to which floor to take the elevator to (8th, if you're curious), but I did recall the photos showed a rooftop hotel.   Once I got to the 8th floor, I was no longer concerned: the lobby is cute, the staff are all phenomenal and friendly and helpful, and my room had a huge balcony where I can see a partial city view.   I enjoyed my stay there, Mohammed was great, the housekeeping staff were very attentive, and I would stay there again.   They will be an amazing boutique hotel once renovations are completed and the restaurant is open!

name: The Square Boutique Hotel
aminities: ,Street parking,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Free breakfast,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Airport transportation,Concierge,Non-smoking hotel,24-hour check-in,Public wifi,Breakfast available,Car hire,24-hour front desk,Laundry service,Washing machine,Ironing service,Air conditioning,Housekeeping,Private balcony,Room service,Minibar,Cable / satellite TV,Electric blanket,Bidet,Seating area,Separate dining area,Telephone,Bottled water,Private bathrooms,Electric kettle,Flatscreen TV,Bath / shower,Complimentary toiletries,City view,Landmark view
location: 3 Talaat Harb Square Number 4th Floor, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: The staffs is horrible, all of them (one girl and two boys that we met) lied about everything and make no effort to speak in English. The girl from reception started to speak with us for check-in, after somebody else comes (an egyptian) and let us just like this, for 10 minute, without no information.  All of them want money from everything. They showed a book with some activities that they organize (Giza Piramids, Cairo) and when we said "thank you" politely, because we already booked, she started to do some facial expressions... The room was dirty, we found some packages near the windows... Unfortunately, I did not take some pictures. Also, they start to serve the breakfast after 9, 9.30, we said that we need to go to visit and the visits starts early in the morning, but just they don't care. It was needed me to yell to him to have the breakfast at 8.30 (an acceptable hour, after me). And, the last lie was the transfer to airport. They proposed us to get to airport and we accepted (for 250 LE - triple than the Uber). We also asked and paid one more night there till our flight (that was at 4am) because my husband twisted his ankle. We agreed with them to get us at 00.30 (so, with a lot of time in advance) from hotel. The girl told us that it takes one hour to arrive at the airport. At 23, they came to our door saying that 'the driver is already here and the way to airport is very crowded'. I said that i think it's ok because we have tine until the flight, but to be sure, we accepted to leave at 00.00. After 20 minutes, they came back and said that we need to go now because the way is blocked because of some works. They hurry us to leave the room (even if we paid the completely night). My thought is that they did not register the payment (all was cash) and all of them kept the money for one night (624 LE). And guess what, we made 20 minutes till the airport ...no trafic and no works. All was a lie just to make us leave faster. As i said before, i think that they shared the money between them.  I do NOT recomand this hotel. For us, it was an horrible experience. They ALL want just our money without making a minimum of attention to us.  Thanks, Ioana Dumitrescu…

The food upstairs for the breakfast was mostly inedible. The elevator is something from the early 20th century. The reception area is small cramped and unclean. The INTERNET is TERRIBLE. Needless to say after 2 nights booked another hotel which is lovely.

description: We are the exclusive Japanese Hostel in all of Cairo and Egypt.  Our standards of excellence in service and cleanliness are unsurpassed by competitively priced accommodation here in Cairo. We are the only hostel that is run by an independent joint Japanese/Egyptian venture. Our resident managers are all fluent in Japanese, Arabic and English and will be happy to give you any information that you need during and after your stay in Cairo and Egypt. High Speed Wi-Fi internet access is available free of charge. We do free airport pick up or transfer if you stay more than 3 nights with us in single or double room. Along with our excellent staff and services we offer hotel reservation. Domestic & International airfare reservation. 1st class seating train ticket reservation. Sleeper Car train ticket reservation. Tour packages with your choice of 25 different and exciting itineraries. Arrangement for Arabic lessons and classes as individual or in groups. We are only a short fifteen minute's walk from the famous Egyptian museum and Ramses railway station. Get captured by the Venice Hosokawaya hostel ... !!!!!!!!Travelers should note:@  Our hostel doesn't allow non-married males and females to stay together in the same room, however, male and female dorm rooms are available.@  Drinking of alcohol is not permitted anywhere on the hostel premises.

name: Royal Maadi Hotel
location: 11th, Road 18th, Sarayat El-Maadi, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: I spent 3 nights at the Royal Maadi Hotel (previously known as Residence Hotel). The service was the best, better than any 5 star- literally. Any issues, they come right away, the housekeeping was extremely helpful and on top of everything with personalized service, the concierge very helpful, and the reception very polite and courteous. When my daughter got stain on the walls the manager was very courteous and accommodating. They also brought for me flowers and fruit per my family's request.  I took a 3 bedroom suite which was an apartment. Each bedroom had a queen size bed. There was also a dining area, salon area, kitchen, and bathroom. The style was a bit outdated but the availability and convenience of everything made up for it. There was microwave, fridge, toaster, oven, kitchenware, ironing board, tv, and desks.   I appreciated the cleanliness- everything was covered in plastic and sanitized.   Breakfast was very basic with boiled egg, jam, bread, cheese, OJ, tea/nescafe.   Delivery is easy through talabat app where I ordered things from the pharmacy and other restaurants. The hotel is keen about safety so no delivery persons come to the room, instead the concierge will carry up the item and you give him the money. I made sure to leave a tip for both him and the person delivering.  There are also a few restaurants and cafes downstairs although I didn't try any. One is particularly famous in Maadi for breakfast called Ovio (?).  The location is quiet, removed from the hustle and bustle of Cairo, and a view of trees and greenery specific to Maadi. I loved the balcony to relax in.   I totally recommend this hotel for short or extended stay. Special thanks to Mr. Sayed the manager, Ms. Asmaa the receptionist, Ms. Heba the housekeeper, Mr. Nour/Nouh the concierge. Excellent service and help from them.…

name: Maxim Hotel
aminities: ,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Room service

description: Central location, close to everything, but on a quiet street. The staff was very helpful and accommodating. They are renovating the hotel, so some of the rooms are brand new and spacious. Good breakfast. Has wifi. Recommended!

name: Jewel Green Mountain Hotel
location: 19 Green Mountain Buildings, Nasr Road Nasr City, Next to Queen Service Company, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: Not only is the hotel bad, it's the whole customer experience, hotel facilities are horrible, food is unbelievable, staff, room, everything calls you to escape the hotel. Internet wifi does not work all the time.  Breakfast restaurant welcomes you with an awful smell. The room is unbelievable, The water in the shower is just a small drops of water. And believe me, you don’t want to sniff bathroom’s aroma. !!  The bed mattress is very old and curved which causes unbearable back pain.

name: Sun Hotel
aminities: ,Airport transportation,Baggage storage
location: 2 Talaat Harb Street Tahrir Square, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: I stayed for 7 nights at Sun Hotel. The place looks much better than you could expect after the photos on tripadvisor. Rooms are simple, but clean. I took a cheaper option - with no A/C and shared bathroom and it was more than ok. Bathrooms are being cleaned few times a day, the water is warm. Some of the rooms have a great view to Tahrir Square - ask, if they are available. The biggest advantage of the hotel is the location - walking distance (5 min.) from the Egyptian Museum, close to the Nile, next to the metro station. The staff can speak english and are really helpful.

location: 3 El Thawra Council St Zamalek, Cairo Egypt
description: On the southern tip of Gezirah Island, the hotel is a corner of paradise in central Cairo, minutes from Cairo’s business districts. Discover a haven of peace during a vacation in Egypt, and a comfortable base to rest after a successful day of business. Relax by the pool, pamper yourself in Sofitel SPA, wine and dine in our international restaurants and bars. Surrender to luxury and come for a day, a weekend, a week…or more. A stroll along the hotel’s lush riverside promenade takes you to a host of acclaimed restaurants and bars. You can take your time, enjoying the cool shade of exotic palms and breathing in the scent of hibiscus. You’ll hear the gentle sound of water lapping as you rest on a Nile-side terrace with a cool drink, and dine on international cuisine. It’s especially beautiful at dusk, when the sun sets over Cairo’s skyline and vibrant nightlife. Escape the city for a day at our secluded Cairo hotel, which feels like an exclusive Egyptian resort set in lush gardens. Take advantage of Sofitel SPA and Sofitel FIT, float in an infinity pool overlooking the Nile, unwind in a bubbling whirlpool bath… whatever you desire. Day membership includes discounts to the restaurants and bars which line the Nile-side promenade, promising refreshment and fun for families, couples and friends.

description: Modern serviced apartments for extended stays in dynamic Cairo Citystars. Offering the comfort and convenience of a home away from home, Staybridge Suites® Cairo Citystars has everything you need for independent living in the exciting commercial hub of Heliopolis. With direct access to Stars Centre shopping mall, and just a seven-minute drive from Cairo International Airport and Cairo International Convention and Exhibition Centre, our 140 fully furnished studios and suites place travelers where they need to be. The buzzing streets of downtown Cairo are half an hour away, with the Great Pyramids a little further. Business travelers on extended stays in Cairo can settle into a spacious studio or suite with up to three bedrooms. Full kitchens and living areas let you cook, work and entertain in style, and Wi-Fi is complimentary throughout. A free buffet breakfast sets you up for the day, and an Evening Social invites you to mingle with fellow guests over dinner three nights a week.

location: 42 Talaat Harb 6th Floor, Down Town, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: I stayed in this hotel twice during my Egypt tour. The hotel is located in the Talaat Harb area (city center) of Cairo city and within 1 km of the of the Cairo museum (old one at Tahrir square). Khane-Kahlil and Al-Azhar mosque areas are not too far. The owner and the staffs (Ms Wafa and Mr. Amun) of the hotel were very friendly.  Rooms and the building were ole and very basic, bathroom had hot water. Clean room/bathroom. Breakfast was provided.

description: Welcome to Colour Holidays, your Cairo “home away from home.” Colour Holidays aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.While staying at Colour Holidays, visitors can check out Mosque of Syeda Zainab (2.5 mi) and Khan Al-Khalili (2.9 mi), some of Cairo's top attractions.The rooms offer a fireplace, extra long beds, and a seating area, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.Colour Holidays features 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage. In addition, as a valued Colour Holidays guest, you can enjoy an on-site restaurant that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.Travellers looking to enjoy some ribs can head to The Tap Maadi. Otherwise, you may want to check out an Asian restaurant such as Le Peking Zamalek, Sabai Sabai Thailand Restaurant, or The Karvin Hotel.If you are interested in exploring Cairo, check out one of the art museums, such as Gayer-Anderson Museum (Bayt al-Kiritliya), The Coptic Museum, and Museum of Islamic Arts.Colour Holidays puts the best of Cairo at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

description: A modern, family-friendly hotel in Cairo's dynamic Citystars Heliopolis In the heart of Citystars business and leisure complex and just 10 minutes from Cairo International Airport, the Holiday Inn® Cairo Citystars hotel is an ideal base for exploring the modern and historic attractions of Egypt's capital. Next to the hotel, Stars Centre Mall is home to over 640 of shops and high-tech amusements including Snow City and Magic Galaxy, Egypt's largest indoor theme park. Downtown Cairo is less than half an hour away. The hotel's family-friendly atmosphere makes everyone feel at home, from the rooftop garden with its adults' and children's swimming pools, to the Star Corner Café in the lobby. Open 24-hours, Windows Restaurant tempts diners with heaped international buffets and live cooking stations, and Indira Restaurant serves some of the best Indian food in Cairo. Business travelers appreciate the fast, free Wi-Fi, business center and 24-hour room service. Need to hold a meeting?

name: Garden Season Hotel

description: I don’t recommend that place at all… they didn’t honor any booking was made on booking.com after I arrived with my family and my little kids they said that my booking is exist but they don’t have any available rooms because my booking was made on booking.com, it wasn’t only me, there were two more families sitting in the reception facing the same issue. Worst hotel in Egypt . Don’t ever book there or waste your time with them.

location: 171 Mohamed Farid St Downtown, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: Nitocrisse Hotel is located down town Cairo. The location places you in the heart of Cairo. All the touristic attractions are in the vicinity or effortlessly within reach from the Hotel. The Egyptian museum is a 10-minute walk, Islamic Cairo is the same distance, and the railway station is two kilometers far. The Tahrir square where you can pick any transportation means to all touristic sites is also a 10-minute Walk.Our small 45-room hotel is located on the 5th and 6th floors with four efficiently operating lifts. The hotel was established in 1955 and since then we have been trying to offer a service typical of a small family business. Our residents normally get quickly familiar with our friendly personnel who are keen on offering the best they could with respect to cleanliness and room service. We also have our homey kitchen and chef trained and experienced in Egyptian, oriental recipes together with well-known French and Italian dishes. Our dishes are competent price-wise compared to many of the nearby classical restaurants. For those who might not be interested in eating in the hotel, there are plenty of varied choices ranging between classical restaurants and more economic coffee-shops and chains, many of which are at a short walking distance-between 3 to 5 minutes . Amenities include restaurant, room service, 24 hour front Desk, lift/elevator, Air conditioned rooms, TV, laundry service...etc.

description: Set on the picturesque and exclusive island of Zamalek on the magnificent waters of the River Nile, the Hilton Zamalek Residence Cairo is located in a tranquil spot between downtown Cairo and Giza and is only 12 miles from Cairo Airport. All of the luxurious guest rooms at this hotel in Cairo offer spectacular city or river views and feature modern amenities such as high-speed internet access and LCD TVs. Upgrade to an elegant suite for additional space, a kitchen, living and dining areas and terraces offering scenic Nile views. Hold a professional conference in one of 3 flexible meeting rooms, all of which feature the latest in audio/visual technology and make use of our business center. Dine on international and oriental cuisine overlooking the pool and the River Nile in Nile Breeze, listen to live music in the Tea Time Lounge and enjoy casual al fresco food and drink on the deck at Waves. Work out in the complimentary Fitness Center, swim lengths in the heated swimming pool, which features a Jacuzzi or indulge in a massage while the little ones have fun in the Children’s Play Area. Explore the Egyptian Museum, experience the exotic sights, sounds and smells of the vibrant Egyptian Bazaar, 'Khan El-Khalili' and marvel at the Great Sphinx and Pyramids at Giza.

description: A melting pot of history and diversity, the city of Cairo is ideal for both business and leisure. Like the city itself, Fairmont Nile City offers a delightful series of contrasts, combining advanced technology and modern design with local flavors and flair. With sweeping panoramas of the river Nile and the Pyramids in the distance, Cairo’s beauty and history are always in sight from your luxury accommodation. During your stay, embark on culinary adventures at the city’s finest restaurants, enjoy the fresh air at our rooftop poolside restaurant and pamper yourself at Willow Stream Spa. Part of the prestigious Nile City complex, this luxury hotel is the perfect location for business events. The space consists of 845 square meters (9,100 square feet) plus 450 square meters (4,800 square feet) of outdoor space dedicated to meetings and conventions, comprising of 10 meeting rooms including a ballroom. The space also offers spectacular river Nile views.

location: 3 El Thawra Council St Zamalek, Cairo Egypt
description: On the southern tip of Gezirah Island, the hotel is a corner of paradise in central Cairo, minutes from Cairo’s business districts. Discover a haven of peace during a vacation in Egypt, and a comfortable base to rest after a successful day of business. Relax by the pool, pamper yourself in Sofitel SPA, wine and dine in our international restaurants and bars. Surrender to luxury and come for a day, a weekend, a week…or more. A stroll along the hotel’s lush riverside promenade takes you to a host of acclaimed restaurants and bars. You can take your time, enjoying the cool shade of exotic palms and breathing in the scent of hibiscus. You’ll hear the gentle sound of water lapping as you rest on a Nile-side terrace with a cool drink, and dine on international cuisine. It’s especially beautiful at dusk, when the sun sets over Cairo’s skyline and vibrant nightlife. Escape the city for a day at our secluded Cairo hotel, which feels like an exclusive Egyptian resort set in lush gardens. Take advantage of Sofitel SPA and Sofitel FIT, float in an infinity pool overlooking the Nile, unwind in a bubbling whirlpool bath… whatever you desire. Day membership includes discounts to the restaurants and bars which line the Nile-side promenade, promising refreshment and fun for families, couples and friends.

name: Golden Star Hotel
aminities: ,Laundry service
location: 11 Sherif Basha In front of El Lewaa Building , 3rd floor, Abdeen, Downtown, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: Hôtel réservé via Booking. Arrivée à 3h du matin après un long vol, en famille alors que 3 chambres avaient été réservées… pour s’entendre dire après 1h de taxi que l’hôtel avait décidé de louer nos chambres sans nous prévenir. Emplacement bien mais hôtel minable, immeuble en travaux, ascenseur qui fait peur, personnel minable.

name: Stay Inn Hotel - Cairo
location: 49 Syria Street Mohandessin, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: سعت بتواجدي في هذا الفندق الرايع واكثر من رايع من حسن المعالمه والاستقبال وجودته ونظافته ومن موظفين الاستقبال بالترحيب الحارررر جدا  واتمنى ان اكرر زيارتي لي هذا الفندق الرائع قريب واشكر الاستاذ مصطفى والاستاذه مارينا  على الترحيب والابتسامه واللطافه ولا انسى المدير الكبير الاستاذ حازم على اهتمامه بالعملاء   وشكرا لكم جزيل واتمنى يجيهم خطاب شكرا  اخوكم عبدالله الزهراني من السعوديه

name: Capital Hotel Cairo
location: Behlar Passage Building Number 1, From Kasr Al Nile St., First Floor Downtown, Cairo 99999 Egypt
description: This has been another good choice for this trip!   A local friend helped me find it.  Staff are GREAT!   EXCELLENT ENGLISH,  friendly quick & thorough responses to requests.   The lobby & rooms are kept neat and clean & comfortable.  My Room was super quiet due to thick walls and being in the center of the building.  Location is also solo perfectly situated.   10 min walk from Cairo Museum,  3 min walk to Jazz restaurant.... Excellent local take away.... It's where the locals eat.    I would stay here again and do highly recommend it.  Brian

name: City Hotel
aminities: ,Paid public parking on-site,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Restaurant,Bicycle rental,Evening entertainment,Free airport transportation,Business Centre with Internet Access,Massage,Car park,Internet,Breakfast available,Breakfast in the room,Snack bar,Airport transportation,Car hire,Taxi service,Salon,BBQ facilities,Baggage storage,Concierge,Currency exchange,Gift shop,Mosquito net,Newspaper,Shared lounge / TV area,ATM on site,24-hour front desk,Express check-in / check-out,Private check-in / check-out,Dry cleaning,Laundry service,Ironing service,Shoeshine,Air conditioning,Desk,Housekeeping,Private balcony,Coffee / tea maker,Minibar,Electric blanket,Bath / shower,Room service,Safe,Seating area,Telephone,Wardrobe / wardrobe,Clothes rack,Laptop safe,Wake-up service / alarm clock,Electric kettle,Complimentary toiletries,Hair dryer
location: 162 El-tahrir st., Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: The City Hotel is situated in the center of Cairo, less than a 1-minute walk from the Egyptian Museum and Tahrir Square. In addition to convenient restaurants such as KFC or the famous oriental restaurant Felfela, several banks, embassies, and Metro stations are all within walking distance. The property is within a 5-minute walk to the Jewish temple and many other places of worship. The hotel offers elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi and has a restaurant that serves regional cuisine. For the comfort of the guests' room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a TV with satellite channels, a mini-bar, and a safety deposit box. Each room has a private bathroom fitted with a shower. All rooms at the hotel feature a city-view balcony. A complimentary breakfast is served daily which includes fresh fruits, vegetables, cheeses, breads, and eggs cooked to order. With a little advance notice upon your arrival, trips to destinations that you chose (according to a schedule of your choosing) can be arranged. Laundry service is also provided upon request. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Khan Al Khalili is 1 km from the City Hotel, while Muizz Street is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 16 km away.

name: Gamaleya Boutique Hotel
location: 14 Street Amir El Geyoush, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: This lovely hotel is a hidden gem just inside the walls of the old part of Cairo. This is where you will immediately feel you are part of Cairo street life with all its amazing colour and energy in a way you never would in one of the smart hotels in the modern part of Cairo. The minute you walk out of the door you will be in the vast ancient souk full of life and colour. The building used to be a soap factory which the owner discovered in ruins and has built into a delightful boutique hotel. It’s a true community enterprise because on the ground floor are artisan craftspeople working in separate little workshops - silversmiths, weavers, woodworkers etc- you can enjoy watching them at work and buy their beautiful creations if you like. The staff are absolutely lovely - nothing us too much trouble for them. This place feels more like a home than a hotel. Highly recommended!…

With direct access to Stars Centre shopping mall, and just a seven-minute drive from Cairo International Airport and Cairo International Convention and Exhibition Centre, our 140 fully furnished studios and suites place travelers where they need to be. The buzzing streets of downtown Cairo are half an hour away, with the Great Pyramids a little further. Business travelers on extended stays in Cairo can settle into a spacious studio or suite with up to three bedrooms. Full kitchens and living areas let you cook, work and entertain in style, and Wi-Fi is complimentary throughout. A free buffet breakfast sets you up for the day, and an Evening Social invites you to mingle with fellow guests over dinner three nights a week.

name: Richmond House Hostel
aminities: ,Paid public parking on-site,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Coffee shop,Children's television networks,Pets Allowed ( Dog / Pet Friendly ),Airport transportation,Salon,Baggage storage,Street parking,Breakfast in the room,Shuttle bus service,Car hire,Convenience store,Currency exchange,Gift shop,Newspaper,Outdoor furniture,Shared kitchen,Shared lounge / TV area,Shops,ATM on site,24-hour front desk,Express check-in / check-out,Dry cleaning,Laundry service,Ironing service,Housekeeping,Room service,Safe,Bottled water
location: 41 Sherif Basha, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: This hotel was a discovery for me! I originally booked a neighbor hotel, but when I arrived there at 3:00 AM they told me they were overbooked and had no room for me. Richmond House was the closed one, so I popped up without a reservation and the manager on reception was more than helpful. He only had one room available for just one night, so he let me take it with a good rate. He advised me to check again next day, and luckily they had a cancellation, so I continued my stay in another room.  Both rooms were clean, nicely furnished in a traditional style. Beds were very comfortable. Hot water was always available. Cleaning lady was doing a great job. All staff I met were super friendly and went out of their way to assist.  The location is convenient. If you walk out from the building, you will find many places to eat - from street vendors and fast food chain (KFC is 5 minutes walk) to decent restaurants. Tahrir Square and Egyptian Museum are around 15 minutes walk.  I definitely recommend this hotel for a budget stay!…

name: Jewel Maadi Cabins and Club
location: Corniche El Nil Road in front of Maadi Star Towers, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: Do not expect 4* hotel, room is poor furniture is old with new paint, good view, room is clean but bathroom is wet, swimming pool opening to 4PM and then training started ,staff was helping but not professional.

description: A modern, family-friendly hotel in Cairo's dynamic Citystars Heliopolis In the heart of Citystars business and leisure complex and just 10 minutes from Cairo International Airport, the Holiday Inn® Cairo Citystars hotel is an ideal base for exploring the modern and historic attractions of Egypt's capital. Next to the hotel, Stars Centre Mall is home to over 640 of shops and high-tech amusements including Snow City and Magic Galaxy, Egypt's largest indoor theme park. Downtown Cairo is less than half an hour away. The hotel's family-friendly atmosphere makes everyone feel at home, from the rooftop garden with its adults' and children's swimming pools, to the Star Corner Café in the lobby. Open 24-hours, Windows Restaurant tempts diners with heaped international buffets and live cooking stations, and Indira Restaurant serves some of the best Indian food in Cairo. Business travelers appreciate the fast, free Wi-Fi, business center and 24-hour room service. Need to hold a meeting?

description: El edificio es horrible, la habitación que me dieron olía fatal y el colchón el peor en el que he dormido en mucho tiempo. Los impuestos no estaban incluidos en el precio que resultó carísimo para lo que ofrecen.
